Title: The story of stealing grain
Publisher: Aiguo weisheng yundong weiyuanhui (爱国卫生运动委员会), Hongshizihui (红十字会), Weisheng fangyizhan (卫生防疫站)
Notes: Birds and rats conspire to steal grain for the winter, but are spotted by Pioneers (below left), who kill them with traps, a stone and a small guillotine (the three pictures on the right). Published by the Patriotic Health Campaign Committee, the Red Cross and the Health and Epidemic Prevention Station, Shanxi Province.
